name: MY LEGS ARE BROKEN! (alpha v 0.0.1)
description:
welcome to a epic pixel art puzzle game where you have to move bad guys and use them as stairs or other objects!

possibly coming to mobile.

you're PC may say the file is dangerous: just click more info and then run anyway I don't know why it says this. ill try to fix it in the future.

intended release date: March 31, 2022
